TextLibrary.Text: Your Majesty, I rescued some of the captives, but I couldn't save them all.
Your Majesty, I rescued some of the captives, but I couldn't save them all.
Your Majesty, I rescued some of the captives, but I couldn't save them all.
Your Majesty, I rescued some of the captives, but I couldn't save them all.

During the battle some of the Undead escaped, taking whatever captives they could. The prisoners had been mistreated. I would have been risking the lives of the ones I DID save if I had left them to chase after the others.

You have our thanks. We know you did all that was possible.
